title: I love tux but
comment: I love Tux Racer, always have, but passing this on my Galaxy Note 3 is glitchy. The penguin won't go faster  than five mph and I can't get anywhere. Is this user error on my part? O_O

title: Gyro code is borked
comment: Swings heavy to the right as was stated. Discovered that if held like it were in portrait mode, tux moves just fine. You'll quickly get a neck cramp, but it works.  It looks like this app hasn't got any love in a while so maybe another dev reading this could make a fork and fix things? Please?

title: Please fix control orientation
comment: Hey guys, major fix for Galaxy Note 10.1 needed. The game orientation is a problem. When im racing down the slope and want to turn, my horizontal screen is playing with me.
